header: The Fifth Vision: A Lampstand and Two Olive Trees

verse: Then the angel who was speaking with me returned and woke me up in the same way that a man is awakened from sleep.
He said to me, “What do you see?”
There are two olive trees beside it, one to the right of the bowl, and one to its left.”
I asked the angel who was speaking with me, “What are these, my lord?”
The angel who was speaking with me answered me, “Don’t you know what these are?”
Then the word of the Lord came to me:
Then I asked him, “What are these two olive trees to the right and left of the lampstand?”
I asked him a second time, “What are the two olive branches that are beside the two gold conduits that pour out the golden oil?”
He said to me, “Don’t you know what these are?”
Then he said, “These are the two anointed ones who stand by the Lord of all the earth.”
